desc.en: ACTIVE REUNION MEMBERSHIP INCLUDED! Discover this elegant 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom custom-built home, perfectly situated on an oversized, secluded Quarter Acre lot in the prestigious Reunion Resort. This fully furnished masterpiece offered as a Turn-Key property boasts over 4,100 sq. ft. of living space (with A/C Games Room and Theatre) and offers unparalleled privacy and style. Step into a resort-style outdoor oasis featuring one of the largest enclosed screened pool enclosures in Reunion, complete with a luxury heated pool, heated spa, ping-pong table, and a built-in brick BBQ. There's ample space for lounging with eight sunbeds, two parasols, outdoor tables with seating for eight guests, plus manicured gardens surrounding the pool for added tranquility. The screened enclosure offers further expansion to the rear if desired, perfect for large outdoor group entertaining. You'll find high-end interiors, a Double Primary Suite with a huge en-suite Bathroom, a spacious Walk-In Closet Room, and Private Balcony Access. Plus, there are three additional spacious bedrooms upstairs with balconies at the front and rear of the home and a downstairs Guest Bedroom With an Ensuite Bathroom. The second floor features a large game loft with a professional-grade pool table, while the first-floor movie room includes a state-of-the-art digital projector to watch Movies, stream any of your favorite channels, news, or switch to play Sony PS3 Games - all whilst enjoying the Sound system, a 100"¬ù screen, and reclining theater seating. The Dedicated Games Room offers non-stop entertainment with Two Fast & Furious Car Racers, Sony Playstations, Fuseball, and NBA Basketball Game. This property is a luxurious retreat and a solid investment, showing 67% Occupancy levels for 2024 with Magical Vacation Mgmt. All Current Bookings In 2025 Will be conveyed to the New Owner With Magical Vacations. This Home has an ACTIVE Reunion Resort Membership With the $15,000 Initiation Fee Paid by the Seller, granting access to world-class amenities, including 3 Signature Golf Courses, a Water Park, Restaurants, Fitness Classes, and More. Don't miss this opportunity to own a custom-built gem in one of Central Florida's premier communities. Schedule your private tour today! Amazing, Fully renovated beautiful 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath home located in Reunion Resort. Perfect vacation getaway. Located walking distance to all the spectacular amenities Reunion Resort has to offer. Reunion Resort has great proximity to all the major theme parks especially WALT DISNEY WORLD being just 2 exits away, makes this vacation community a top choice for visitors of all ages. If you are looking to take a few golf swings while on your vacation you can take the challenge on any of the 3 World Class Championship GOLF COURSES designed by Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson And Jack Nicklaus that are located on-site. Reunion offers many onsite restaurants from hamburgers at The Cove to fine dining at Forte and everything in between. There are 12 pools in the community including a MULTIMILLION DOLLAR WATER PARK with lazy river & water slide. Home has new Roof install in January, new hot water tank etc. Also has an active Reunion Resort membership associated with property.

desc.en: Welcome to your luxurious retreat in the heart of Reunion, Florida! This stunning 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience, nestled within the prestigious Reunion Resort community. Step inside to discover a beautifully renovated interior, where modern design meets upscale finishes. The spacious living area boasts plush furnishings and ample natural light, creating an inviting atmosphere for relaxation and entertainment. The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring sleek countertops, stainless steel appliances, and all the essentials for whipping up delicious meals. Enjoy your culinary creations at the dining table or take in the fresh air on the private balcony, overlooking scenic views of the resort. Retreat to the master suite, complete with a king-sized bed, walk-in closet, and a luxurious en-suite bathroom with a soaking tub and separate shower. Two additional bedrooms offer comfortable accommodations for family or guests, each thoughtfully appointed with cozy bedding and plenty of storage space. As a resident of Reunion Resort, you'll have access to a wealth of amenities, including championship golf courses, a water park, tennis courts, and numerous pools. Indulge in fine dining at on-site restaurants, unwind with a spa treatment, or simply soak up the Florida sunshine by the poolside. Whether you're looking for a lucrative investment opportunity through Airbnb or seeking your own slice of paradise to call home, this renovated and furnished condo in Reunion offers the perfect blend of luxury and convenience. Don't miss your chance to experience resort-style living at its finest!

Welcome to Spectrum Plus at Reunion Resort, Experience the pinnacle of luxury living in this stunning four-bedroom, three-and-a-half-bathroom vacation condo nestled in the exclusive Spectrum Plus at Reunion Resort. Perfectly located in Central Florida's most sought-after area for visitors, this property offers unparalleled access to world-class entertainment, premier shopping, and championship golf courses in the Greater Orlando area. This exceptional property is a valuable addition to your portfolio, providing an ideal space for relaxation and entertainment. The thoughtfully designed floor plan boasts a modern, open-concept layout, seamlessly connecting the spacious living area to a gourmet kitchen outfitted with high-end appliances, ample cabinetry, and elegant finishes"‚Äùcreating a perfect setting for memorable family moments and guest experiences. Each of the bedrooms is generously sized and features large windows that fill the rooms with natural light. The primary suite, conveniently located on the first floor, offers a luxurious ensuite bathroom with dual vanities, a walk-in closet, and a private water closet for ultimate privacy. Upstairs, the versatile loft space leads to an expansive outdoor area, offering stunning views and a serene atmosphere to unwind after a day of adventure. This level also includes additional bedrooms and bathrooms, ensuring privacy and comfort for all guests. Resort-Style Amenities:Reunion Resort offers an impressive array of amenities that set it apart from the rest. Highlights include: A clubhouse with a game room and concierge services to meet every need. A state-of-the-art fitness center. A resort-style pool with private cabanas, a fantastic kiddie water park, and miniature golf. On-demand golf cart transportation services. Access to six resort restaurants and 10 community pools. Complimentary transportation to Walt Disney World, located just 10 minutes away. Additionally, the condo's proximity to parking and its location backing onto the beautiful golf course provide both convenience and breathtaking views. Only 30 minutes from Orlando International Airport, this property is perfectly positioned to deliver both convenience and excitement. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to own a piece of luxury in one of the world's premier investment locations. This two-level condo is the perfect blend of elegance, comfort, and accessibility. Schedule your private tour today!

Don't you deserve¬†to enjoy the Florida life year round?¬† 7501 Mourning Dove Circle in sought after Reunion is just that; a fully furnished "lock & leave" type of home which affords you the luxury of having a secure place to stay when visiting Florida; or to utilize as an investment at the same time.¬† This fully furnished unit has timeless style and furnishings, and provides that hotel-like vibe every time you walk through the front door and into the foyer.¬† Offering three bedrooms & two full bathrooms, this condominium can accommodate enough guests to make every stay feel like a vacation.¬† The front bedroom is designed for the kids; with a bunk-bed and plenty of closet space, while the room across the hall is ideal for more space; and offers a queen size bed.¬† Shared by a well updated bathroom in between, granite countertops, continuous ceramic tile and bathtub and shower combination are just the right size.¬† Do you like to entertain?¬† If you answered yes, then this next space will suit you perfectly!¬† A chef's kitchen with stainless steel appliances, espresso cabinets and an abundance of counter space will leave your guests envious for days!¬† Adjacent to the kitchen is the conveniently¬†positioned dining room table which can seat at least eight, and truly ties in all of the common space together.¬† For added privacy, your primary bedroom is situated in the rear of the home, with more windows that you can count and direct access to the outside balcony, so that you can enjoy your morning latte.¬† Granite countertops flank your dual vanities, and offer a spa-like feel with a walk-in shower and updated tiling. Crown molding, tray ceilings and updated fixtures are detailed throughout the home in every corner.¬† ONE CAR GARAGE INCLUDED (EXTRA LARGE) | FULLY FURNISHED | 7 RESTAURANTS & BARS | FITNESS CENTER | 2 PROFESSIONAL GOLF SHOPS | 5 ACRE WATER PARK | 3 SIGNATURE GOLF COURSES DESIGNED BY TOM WATSON, JACK NICKLAUS & ARNOLD PALMER | 24 HOUR GUARD GATED COMMUNITY | HOA INCLUDES WATER, CABLE & INTERNET |

desc.en: TOUR: https://www.tourdrop.com/dtour/388730 Welcome to 7400 Soiree Way! Nestled on a prime corner lot in Homestead neighborhood of the renowned Reunion Resort, this must-see 5-bedroom, 3-full, 2-half bath property was completely and meticulously renovated in 2022 with high-end finishes and details such as Plantation Shutters and Crown Moulding throughout, and two HVAC systems (one thermostat for each floor). An active transferable Reunion membership is available for the next owners of this home, providing exclusive access to world-class golf courses, tennis and pickleball courts, a water park, and additional amenities. Beautiful Luxury Vinyl Tile flooring flows throughout this open floor plan, featuring a gourmet Kitchen with 3-inch waterfall quartz counter island, top-of-the-line matte black ZLINE & GE Caf√É¬© appliances, abundant cabinet storage, and a dry bar with wine fridge & Scotsman ice machine, offering an ideal setup for entertaining. A formal Dining Room connects seamlessly from the Kitchen and into the Grand Foyer, leading to the spacious Living Room with handsome stone accent wall. The conveniently located first floor Primary Bedroom with sliding door to the lanai and pool, features two custom designed closets with premium organizers, and an ensuite Bathroom with double sinks, floating vanities, including one dedicated for makeup, a frameless walk-in shower, and a large soaking tub. The main-floor living space also features a Powder Room and modern Laundry Room with butcher-block counter, shelving and high efficiency Samsung washer/dryer. A new staircase to the second floor was installed during the 2022 renovations. Upstairs, you'll find a large Loft Area with the size to be utilized as a second living room, game room, home theater, playroom, or gym. The four corner Bedrooms, each with new carpeting and ceiling fans, and the two fully updated Bathrooms on either end of the second floor, one with a walk-in shower and one with tub, provide a comfortable lifestyle. Outside, you'll find your private screened-in oasis with a heated Pool, Hot Tub & second Powder Room. Hanging from the elegant wood ceiling are two 55"¬ù TV's, which can be seen from both the lanai or pool, creating the perfect setting for relaxation and entertainment. Connected to this outdoor living space is the entrance to a two-car garage with a brand-new garage door, three overhead storage racks, cabinetry and an overflow fridge and freezer. This smartly designed and lovingly maintained home has been a primary residence since 2022 but has a layout that could still function effectively for renters looking at an upscale stay at Reunion Resort. This prestigious community spans 2,300 acres and offers an array of amenities. A golfer's paradise with three golf courses, designed by Hall of Famers Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson, and Jack Nicklaus. Also within the resort, you'll find a multi-million dollar water park, 12 community pools, two pro shops, six clay tennis courts, pickleball and Put-Put. Reunion Resort is situated in a prime location: One exit from Walt Disney World off of I-4 and 30min from the Universal Studios and SeaWorld. Margaritaville and Celebration are just down the road, while Disney Springs and other high-end shopping centers and restaurants are within a 20-minute drive. It's 30 minutes to Downtown Orlando and Orlando International Airport, while Tampa, Port Canaveral, and the Florida beaches are just an hour in either direction. Don't miss this gem!

This highly sought after 3-bedroom 2.5 Bath 2 story Condo in the amazing Reunion Resort. This completely renovated end condo unit is the one everyone is waiting to hit the market. Its premium location overlooking the 12th Tee and 13th Fairway of the Arnold Palmer Golf Course and steps away from the community pool makes this condo a true gem. When you enter the condo, you will immediately notice the amazing updates that have been made. From the Laminate Flooring throughout the whole home and the updates to the kitchen, which include new sink and freshly painted cabinets, you won't be disappointed. All rooms have been updated with new modern ceiling fans. This home comes with stainless steel appliances including a washer and dryer, as well as a newer tankless gas water heater for added convenience and reliability. The Primary Bedroom is conveniently located on the first floor along with the Primary Bathroom. The large open living area on the main floor has plenty of natural light due to the beautiful dual French Doors overlooking the golf course. These French Doors also give access to the large, covered lanai so you can sit out back and enjoy your morning coffee. As you move upstairs, you will notice the new laminate flooring continues up the stairs and through both bedrooms. The two bedrooms upstairs are very large and furnished with bed setups for all your guests. A large Jack N Jill bathroom separates these two bedrooms. The exterior of the building has a new roof installed in 2024 and currently is being freshly painted. This unit has not been rented since 2020 as the current owners have spent winters here and time updating the condo. The owners have taken great care in maintaining this condo and it shows! Whether you plan to purchase this condo as an investment, second home or a primary residence, you won't be disappointed. Reunion Resort is a prestigious community spanning 2300 acres, offering an array of amenities for every lifestyle. With three iconic golf courses, including those designed by Palmer, Watson, and Nicklaus, as well as the onsite training of the Leadbetter Golf Academy, this resort is a golfer's paradise. Located just minutes away from the renowned Disney Parks and within close proximity to Florida's finest beaches, this location offers endless opportunities for entertainment and relaxation. Within the resort, you'll find a multimillion dollar water park, 12 community pools, two golf pro shops, six hydro-grid clay tennis courts, and a miniature golf course. Experience the lifestyle you've been longing for at this extraordinary property in Reunion. MAKE SURE TO WATCH THE VIRTUAL TOUR IN THE LINK!!

desc.en: Discover a stunning transitional home with an "Active Reunion Resort Membership," perfectly situated on the 14th hole of the esteemed Jack Nicklaus golf course. Spanning over 7,000 square feet, this property is nestled in the highly sought-after Reunion Resort community. Built by McNally Construction, a renowned luxury home builder, it underwent a luxurious renovation in 2023, featuring exquisite upgrades, designer details, and smart home technology. This private retreat is located on a high-elevation lot, away from the cart paths, and comes with furniture included! It presents a unique opportunity for buyers seeking one of the most enchanting homes in the executive section of Reunion, offering both privacy and charm. As you enter through the grand double iron doors, you'll be greeted by a stunning two-story vaulted entrance adorned with intricate custom woodwork, a hallmark of the finest homes. Stroll through the elegant gallery and admire the three-story tower, complete with a magnificent chandelier and views of the golf course. The chef's dream kitchen boasts high-end gourmet appliances, beautiful granite countertops, premium cabinets with crown molding, and soft-close features. Transition seamlessly to the lanai, where you'll find an entertainer's dream space overlooking the golf course, featuring a large heated infinity pool and spa, a chef's outdoor kitchen with a DCS Built-In Natural Gas Grill, an outdoor gas fireplace, and an expansive custom-paved pool deck. Enjoy a game of billiards in the impressive two-story Billiards Room, highlighted by 20+ ft custom window treatments and tray ceilings. After a day on the course, retreat to the luxurious master suite, which offers views of the infinity pool and lush landscaping that transforms into a magical setting at night. Unwind in your Air Spa Tub in the beautifully designed master bathroom. Guests will be treated to two additional luxury master bedrooms on the second floor, each featuring a garden tub, shower, double sinks, walk-in closets, and a full-length balcony with stunning golf course views. This smart home includes voice and app-controlled pool automation, a whole-house lighting system, motorized blinds, Wi-Fi-enabled garage door openers, Trane XV variable speed AC systems with Halo LED air purifiers, Yale automated deadbolt locks, and a water leak protection system with a remote water main shut-off. Additional conveniences include three chandelier lifts and a whole-house commercial water filtration system with instant hot water, all while maximizing energy efficiency with aluminum thermopane windows. The world-renowned Reunion Resort offers three championship golf courses, private membership amenities, an exceptional waterpark and lazy river, tennis and golf centers, a spa, multiple fine dining options, and is conveniently located less than 15 minutes from Walt Disney World.

desc.en: Experience the pinnacle of contemporary luxury living with this stunning and modern condo nestled within the highly coveted Spectrum+ at Reunion Resort. Situated in the heart of a premier golf destination, this exceptional residence offers unparalleled elegance and convenience, mere minutes away from the enchantment of Walt Disney World. Step inside and be captivated by the immaculate interiors of this FULLY FURNISHED masterpiece, thoughtfully designed for turnkey enjoyment. Whether seeking a primary residence or an investment property, this condo caters to all needs, bolstered by the added advantage of an on-site property management company. The essence of sophistication is found in the spacious open floor plan, where three bedrooms and two and a half baths seamlessly blend to create an atmosphere of refined comfort. Modern finishes and exquisite attention to detail enhance the ambiance, while the large kitchen stands as a culinary haven. A full stainless steel Samsung appliance package, including a gas range, elevates your culinary adventures, and a beautiful kitchen island becomes the centerpiece for both culinary creations and cherished moments shared with loved ones. Natural light floods the living space, guiding your gaze toward sliding doors that beckon you onto the expansive paved patio. Here, a panoramic golf course view sets the stage for memorable gatherings, be it entertaining guests or luxuriating in the sun with your favorite cocktail in hand. Indulge in resort-style living with immediate access to the lavish pool, a fully equipped gym, and the awe-inspiring Water Park. Revel in the lazy river's gentle embrace or slide down water slides as you soak in the vibrant ambiance of Reunion. Reunion Resort spans 2300 acres of stunning landscapes and offers not one, but THREE SIGNATURE GOLF COURSES - Tradition by Jack Nicholas, Legacy by Arnold Palmer, and Independence by Tom Watson. Additional amenities include two golf Pro-shops, a plethora of community pools, tennis courts, conference facilities, and a myriad of dining options, from a great steakhouse to a charming sushi bar. Seize this unparalleled opportunity to embrace the Florida lifestyle in this exquisite home, where luxury, leisure, and sophistication converge in perfect harmony. Your oasis awaits Spectrum+ at Reunion Resort - a world of wonder, elegance, and endless possibilities.

desc.en: Welcome to the Vacationers Paradise Mansion! Positioned on an oversized double lot in the pristine golf community of Reunion Resort. This William Stone custom built 10 bedroom mansion, is unlike anything you've ever seen before. Complete with every amenity you would expect from a home of this caliber, and extras including its own indoor Basketball court, Arcade, Sauna and Steam room, making this home a true rarity, and entering it into a league of its own. As you enter the home your eyes will immediately be captivated by the grand imperial staircase that induces your eyes to look up to the beautiful chandelier & hand painted mural on the second floor. As you explore the kitchen you will find its a true chefs kitchen, fully equipped with every appliance to make even the most particular chefs happy, Quartz countertops, and custom cabinets. Off of the kitchen you will find the arcade, recently upgraded with over $100k in new arcade equipment. The kitchen opens to a very comfortable living room, dining room combo, making the home feel very warm and inviting. There are 4 bedrooms on the first floor of this home, all with their own theme, which carries over to the bathrooms for each room. Making your way to your back yard, you will again realize that this home was intentionally designed, with no detail overlooked, making it feel like home except with every amenity you would enjoy in a resort, within one home. To list a few of these amenities in your backyard paradise, you will walk out to a full summer kitchen, complete with mini fridge, and a large sitting area. The outdoor sitting area is all covered and also has retractable screens which you can close for outdoor events and avoid bugs. The large pool has custom color changing lights and sun shelf for sitting in the pool. Plentiful deck space surrounds the pool, allowing you ample sitting areas. Entering using a separate entrance off the pool deck you will enter the indoor basketball court, as you enter the hallway you will see the glass doors on the right that enter you into the basketball court, and steam room to your left. As you traverse the imperial stairway making your way upstairs you will notice the there are 6 more bedrooms all having their own magnificent theme, with that theme carrying into your own personal bathroom. As you make your way to the rear of the upstairs you will notice the uniquely centered movie theater in the center of the upstairs area, complete with quality chairs, quality movie projector, and quality screen. To the rear of the upstairs it opens up to a loft area, currently used as a second living room/bar complete with a pool table. The "skybox" is to the far rear of the home, giving you a third living space to hangout, play games, or overlook the basketball court, with its unique window to the court, giving it a true skybox feel. Reunion Resort is a luxury resort, that also allows short term rental. Reunion Resort is a top choice for visitors of all ages, Featuring 12 Pools In The Community, Including a multimillion dollar water park, 3 championship golf courses, 5 restaurants, tennis/pickleball courts, putt putt golf, and many more amenities, making Reunion truly a city within gates. This home is turnkey, and has so much more to love, that you will have to see in person to appreciate. It is now your turn to call Reunion Resort your new home, or home away from home, welcome home.

desc.en: This exceptional home in the renowned Reunion, FL community combines luxury, privacy, and convenience, making it an outstanding choice for both full-time residents and vacation property investors. As a former builder's model home, it boasts superior craftsmanship, high-end finishes, and thoughtfully designed upgrades that elevate it far above comparable properties. Situated on a desirable corner lot, the property enjoys added privacy and abundant natural light, enhanced by elegant French doors leading to multiple balconies and patios. The durable barrel tile roof complements the home's Mediterranean-inspired charm while ensuring lasting resilience. Curb appeal is further enhanced by an extra-deep paver driveway, ideal for accommodating large households or multi-family vacation groups. Step inside, and you're greeted by a grand foyer adorned with hardwood floors that flow seamlessly throughout the home. Wood stairs, a custom iron bannister, and sophisticated panel molding on the walls add timeless elegance. A pallet wood accent wall introduces a modern, rustic touch, while the spacious main living area centers around a striking gas fireplace with stacked stone detail, creating an inviting space to gather. Just outside, a private outdoor oasis awaits, complete with a paved deck, covered lanai, refreshing cocktail pool, and ample room for entertaining, lounging, or barbecuing. The interior's open-concept design connects the living area to a formal dining space, highlighted by an elegant chandelier. Adjacent, the gourmet kitchen offers pro-grade stainless steel appliances, including a gas range, built-in double oven, and a glass-door French door refrigerator. With its meticulous design, the kitchen balances style and functionality, making it ideal for entertaining or family meals. Upstairs, a versatile loft serves as a game room, exercise area, or play space, providing flexibility for relaxation and recreation. Oversized hallway windows, framed by elegant valances, flood the space with natural light, while a built-in bench adds charm and utility. French doors lead to a large tile balcony overlooking the pool and offering serene golf course views. The primary suite is a true retreat, featuring crown molding, dual built-in closets, and an opulent ensuite bath. Indulge in the spa-like atmosphere of the rain shower, jacuzzi tub, and dual split vanities, providing both luxury and functionality. Located in a gated community with beautifully landscaped sidewalks, this home offers a seamless lifestyle. Enjoy proximity to major attractions like Walt Disney World, Orlando's top shopping and dining destinations, and convenient access to the airport and Florida's beaches. With every detail carefully curated"‚Äù from its custom accents to its model-home quality"‚Äùthis property is an extraordinary opportunity to experience the best of Central Florida living.

This is a very family-oriented home with the open plan first level centered around the great room where you will find a truly social kitchen with a granite island and built-in stainless steel appliances, a comfortable family room and a cozy dining room with a fireplace. Sliding glass doors lead to the pool and spa and spacious pool deck with plenty of room for lounging and enjoying the morning and early afternoon sun. As the sun sets, enjoy the outdoor dining and built-in summer kitchen, the ideal spot for those summer barbecues. The ground floor offers a good size bedroom with its own bath which is ideal for those who find the stairs more challenging. Heading upstairs, there are two luxurious primary suites, each with its own private balcony, on the second and third floors with amazing golf views of the fairway and green. A further two bedrooms and two baths on the second floor provide room for everyone to spread out and have their own space. For recreation, there is a fun games room in the garage as well as two open loft areas on the second and third floors, one of which offers a comfortable gaming area. One or both of these loft areas could easily be turned into additional bedrooms for additional rental potential should that be desired. The home has been well maintained and regularly updated inside and out and is in a rental program with a rental history and future rental potential. Reunion Resort is a gated community offering a variety of amenities including six neighborhood pools, fitness center and a selection of on-property restaurants and lounges including an 11th-floor poolside restaurant with views of the Walt Disney World fireworks as the resort is just six miles from the Disney resort entrance, and a Starbucks coffee shop. The resort HOA includes high-speed internet, HD cable TV, all lawn and landscape maintenance, 24-hour resort security with staffed entrance gates and roving patrols, pest control and termite bond, and annual exterior home pressure washing, all to make home ownership that little bit easier. Call today to see this lovely home.

Looking for a luxury golf-front home at Reunion Resort? Then this beautifully updated former custom builder's model two-story residence, in a prime position in one of the resort's most distinguished neighborhoods, may just fit the bill. The mostly en-suite bedrooms are well distributed, with four of the six bedrooms on the first floor, including the private casita across the courtyard. This allows this lovely sunny home to live more like a one-story but with extra space upstairs for visiting guests. The picturesque courtyard entry and grand entrance hallway invite you into the home, where you will find a beautiful two-story open living area with a grand fireplace offering an abundance of light from the clerestory windows, and amazing green and water views across the recently renovated private pool area to hole 14 of the Jack Nicklaus signature course. Quality features abound in all areas of the home such as marble, travertine and solid wood flooring in the common areas, exotic wood kitchen cabinets that masterfully house the Viking appliances and surround the central butcher block island, private dining area with wet and dry bars and a wine cellar, private downstairs primary retreat with walk-in closet and luxury bath, upstairs entertainment loft area with a bar and pool table opening to the second-floor balcony, all-new air-conditioning units, tankless water heater, barrel tile roof and rain gutters, all new pool equipment, and all new tile in the pool area and front courtyard. The home is completely turnkey with all furnishings, decor and housewares included so it is ready to move in and enjoy. The location is ideal, just a short distance from the Reunion Traditions Clubhouse with a restaurant, bar and golf practice facility, also home to the Golfzon Leadbetter Academy. The home also has an optional transferable active membership to the Reunion Resort and Club to provide full access to the three onsite golf courses designed by Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson and Jack Nicklaus, the 11 onsite swimming pools, a five-acre water park, the tennis and pickleball complex, the mini-golf and resort shuttle, and a host of year-round member-only events and services. Reunion is also just six miles from the Disney resort entrance and a short drive to Orlando airport. Whether your primary residence or vacation getaway, you will love coming home to this elegantly appointed and tastefully updated property. But don't just take our word for it and call today to see it yourself.

This rare stunning 9-bedroom, 9.5-bathroom modern luxury villa spans over 5,900 square feet of pure elegance, offering an unmatched combination of comfort and entertainment, perfectly designed for luxurious family or group getaways. Featuring a massive pool with a rock grotto waterfall surrounded by lush palm trees and a serene nature preserve, it's a private oasis where you can relax in the hot tub sipping a drink or fire up the outdoor kitchen with a top-tier DCS grill for BBQ nights with family and friends. All bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and the two master suites include stand-alone tubs and showers and direct access to either the pool patio or a private balcony. Located within the prestigious, 24/7 guard-gated Reunion Resort & Golf Club, you're just minutes from Disney World and all the spectacular attractions and unparalleled entertainment that the Orlando area has to offer! Plus access to exclusive amenities, like the water park with lazy river with a grill and bar, multiple pools, tennis courts, a full-service spa, numerous prime dining options, including the famous rooftop Eleven, from where you can watch Disney's fireworks every night. desc.en: Come on in and make yourself at home in this stunning villa. This home has it all from MOVIE THEATER, THEMED ROOMS, GYM, and a BEAUTIFUL outdoor POOL. The Art Nouveau-influenced living room is dressed in a lavish champagne and purple palette. You can stretch out on oversized couches, and have a chat or a quiet read in the comfy bucket chairs. The open kitchen boasts elegance in convenience with stainless steel appliances, and a cool breakfast bar with eye-catching purple chairs for four. Funky globe lighting adds the glow to a formal dining table that seats 12. With two ground-floor bedrooms, one of which is wheelchair accessible, plus five more bedrooms on the upper floor, everyone in your family has their choice of super comfort found in premium bedding, and carefully curated d√É¬©cor. Bathrooms have large showers, double sinks, and huge soaking tubs to soothe weary bones after a busy day at the parks or on the course. Your family and their friends will love this Incredible themed bedroom that sleeps six, with four bunk beds, and two trundles and a galactic themed bedroom also with bunk beds (four twin sized beds). Speaking of themed rooms, there's a "Mine-Craft"¬ù-themed game room with basketball and other arcade video games. A billiards room has caf√É¬© seating, and a soccer table. A gym is fully equipped for those who want to break a serious sweat. And when you want to just chill with a bucket of microwave popcorn, choose your favorite movie and head to the home theater. When you're ready to explore the entirety of the exclusive 2,300-acre Reunion Resort, or to make that short trip to Disney--there's a shuttle service to drive you to and from the theme parks or anywhere on the resort property. If there are golfers in your group, you'll want to hit the links at Reunion's three epic PGA Championship courses. Between games, visit one of the 10 premier swimming pools, including the Seven Eagles pavilion, featuring relaxing jacuzzis and a crisp infinity pool, overlooking stunning views of the courses. Treat the family to a trip to the five-acre water park with a huge lazy river and twisting waterslides.
